short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Commissioned by MrAahz and built by ThunderPowa

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Reddit USL Check adds a USL tag after usernames displayed on reddit.  When you click on this tag it will change to either a green "Safe" or a red "Banned" to indicate whether that user is currently Banned on the reddit Universal Scammer List. 

WARNING: On threads with 20 or more comments this extension will significantly increase page load time.  If this delay is too frustrating for you I recommend you look at the Reddit USL in Context extension at https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/reddit-usl-in-context/lkmgoehdijmjcmjhalkoplijkmomlkeo
